COMPANY PROFILE : Samar Floor is one of the premier brands in imported wooden floorings and accessories. Based in Pune and with more than 15 years of experience, Samar Floor has come a long way in establishing itself as a reputed solution provider for wooden floors. It has earned the trust of countless customers and dealers alike. Associated with leading brands that are recognized and respected by the best in Indian Interior designing professionals, Samar Floor is a trusted name in the industry whose clientele includes leading corporate groups, hotels, builders and retailers. Having acquired expertise over the years we have diversified to fulfill the increasing demand for specialized floors. With an extensive range of laminated wooden floor, engineered flooring, solid wood flooring, deck and sports flooring, rubber tiles, vinyl sheets, carpet tiles, artificial grass, waterproof floors the company offers the most comprehensive alternate flooring solutions.

JOB PROFILE : Specialists in installations of wood floors and claddings, we at Samar Floor have been working throughout western India for over 15 years. We are involved in every aspect of the process, from meeting with the client to the final finishing details. Our company assures the highest level of workmanship and customer service.We offer a wide variety of wooden floors, to suit anything from small apartments, outdoor terraces to sprung floors in gymnasiums. We can create a new floor, overlay an old floor, or repair or extend an existing floor. Along with polyurethane finishes, we also offer oils, waxes and color stains to add an element of difference. Experienced in both commercial and residential settings, we work with architects and designers as well as individual clients. We supply a wide range of solid timber flooring (both tongue and groove, and parquet). These can be finished by applying stains from pale whitewashes to dark chocolate brown/black and everything in between.
We also supply an extensive range of quality prefinished engineered flooring, covering a wide selection of timber colors and finishes. The allure of laminate flooring lies not only in its representation of real hardwood and its incredible durability, but also in the ease with which these floors are installed and maintained. Our laminate flooring is available in a plethora of styles and designs.Our Wooden Floors are committed to being eco-friendly. We take great pride in the quality of both our materials and workmanship.After discussing your options and requirements with you, our comprehensive quotes leave nothing to surprise and we aim to work in with your building budget. Each installation comes with our warrantee and our after sales service means we are able to remedy any problems that occur.We at SAMAR AGENCIES enjoy the challenge of the new and interesting projects we undertake. The large varieties of projects we have worked on over the years are testament to our high standards and quality of workmanship.
